alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 3:36AM CDT until June 29 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL NUCKOLLS...EAST CENTRAL FRANKLIN...NORTHERN WEBSTER AND SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 336 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Campbell to near Rosemont, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blue Hill, Campbell, Lawrence, Bladen, Ayr, Cowles and Rosemont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
